archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0423
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a BSS Solution, I need to be able to show applicable prices in NZD for product SKU's, so that customers can be given transparent pricing

properties.value: OOTB, just to clarify we assume that SKU should be stored for integration purpose in PC and in PC we should store original prices Naked price vs discounts should be discussed during product catalogue session.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
